segments.text: I notice the children are involved in some secret activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is perched precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed outward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry it might tip over at any second, sending him sprawling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched high, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a "COOKIE JAR" visible, and his hand is inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's trying to grab a cookie, holding a plate with his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised by his daring, given how close the adult is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He really is risking a significant fall for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mischievous little fellow, completely focused on his prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end badly, with broken cookies and a bumped head.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only imagine the look on his face if he gets caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a bold move, attempting this right in the open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so confident in his mission, despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
